description: A plugin for performing general data transformations using code snippets.
explanation: This plugin executes a provided Python code snippet to transform input data.

inputDefinitions.name: script
inputDefinitions.description: The Python code snippet to execute for transformation. The code has access to a 'params' variable containing the script_parameters. The script should print its result to stdout rather than returning it.

inputDefinitions.name: script_parameters
inputDefinitions.description: Parameters to be passed to the script. Available as a 'params' variable in the script context. The 'value' for this input MUST be a valid JSON string. If referencing outputs from previous steps, embed them as JSON-encoded values within this string. For example, to pass 'metrics' from sourceStep 4: '{"metrics": {"outputName": "metrics", "sourceStep": 4}}'. The TRANSFORM plugin will parse this JSON string and make its contents available to the Python script via the 'params' dictionary.

outputDefinitions.name: transform_result
outputDefinitions.description: The output captured from stdout after executing the code snippet. Can be any string data printed by the script.
